puzzle.title: Title
puzzle.notes: Note that this month's location puzzle is an interactive adventure.
puzzle.hint: Hints in puzzle along with answer confirmation

puzzle.title: Dining Room
puzzle.hint: After assembling the board, follow the board as the ouija would.

puzzle.title: Bathroom
puzzle.hint: All of tiles answers involve HOT and COLD
The dots on the tiles are important
Indexing into the phrases based on number of dots gives you two answers when splitting out HOT answers vs COLD.

puzzle.title: Hall
puzzle.hint: There are only slight difference between the White Noise and EVP answers.

puzzle.title: Kitchen
puzzle.hint: use the difference on the second image to solve
Each difference is a standard type of code
the code types are BRAILLE, ALPHANUMERIC, SEMAPHORE, NATO, BINARY, PIGPEN, MORSE

puzzle.title: Crossing Over (meta puzzle)
puzzle.hint: Match the room to the method of killing with puzzle answers (ghost names)
Draw lines from room to room based on order of the killings
The lines are important for the final answer.
